about.title: About Our University
about.subtitle: Discover our mission, vision, and commitment to excellence in education
about.missionText: To provide exceptional higher education that empowers students to become innovative leaders and engaged global citizens who make meaningful contributions to society.
about.visionText: To be a globally recognized university that transforms lives through education, research, and community engagement, fostering innovation and excellence.
about.historyText: Founded in 1900, our university has been at the forefront of higher education for over a century. We have consistently evolved to meet the changing needs of students and society while maintaining our commitment to academic excellence.
about.leadershipSubtitle: Meet the dedicated leaders who guide our institution towards excellence
about.presidentBio: Dr. Johnson brings over 20 years of academic leadership experience to our university.
about.vpBio: Dr. Chen is a renowned scholar with extensive experience in academic administration.
about.deanBio: Dr. Rodriguez is passionate about student success and campus life excellence.
about.excellenceText: We strive for the highest standards in teaching, research, and service.
about.innovationText: We embrace new ideas and technologies to advance knowledge and solve complex problems.
about.communityText: We foster a supportive and inclusive environment where everyone can thrive.

academics.title: Academics
academics.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive academic programs and world-class faculty
academics.collegesSubtitle: Discover the diverse academic units that make up our university
academics.engineeringDesc: Leading innovation in technology and engineering education
academics.businessDesc: Preparing future business leaders with practical skills and ethical values
academics.sciencesDesc: Advancing knowledge through research and discovery
academics.liberalArtsDesc: Developing critical thinking and communication skills
academics.educationDesc: Preparing effective educators for diverse learning environments
academics.undergraduateDesc: Choose from a wide range of bachelor's and associate degree programs
academics.bachelorDesc: Four-year programs leading to comprehensive undergraduate education
academics.associateDesc: Two-year programs for career preparation or transfer
academics.graduateDesc: Advance your career with our graduate degree programs
academics.doctoralDesc: Research-intensive programs for academic and professional careers
academics.libraryDesc: Access to millions of books, journals, and digital resources
academics.onlineLearningDesc: Flexible online courses and degree programs
academics.calendarDesc: Important dates and deadlines for the academic year

admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.subtitle: Start your journey with us - discover how to join our academic community
admissions.applyNowDesc: Ready to begin your academic journey? Our admissions team is here to help you every step of the way.
admissions.undergraduateDesc: Join our diverse undergraduate community and prepare for a successful future
admissions.graduateDesc: Pursue advanced study and research opportunities at the graduate level
admissions.financialAidDesc: We believe cost should never be a barrier to quality education
admissions.studentLoansDesc: Federal and private loan options available
admissions.visitCampusDesc: Experience our campus community firsthand through guided tours and events
admissions.campusToursDesc: Guided tours led by current students
admissions.overnightStaysDesc: Experience campus life as a student

calendar.instituteScheduleDaysDesc: Academic deadlines, holidays, and important institutional events
